backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with all domain types for users, organizations, projects, documents, deals, activities, contracts, NPS, reports, finance, support messages, and churn metrics.
backend/migration.mo: Provides type definitions for old and new actor states and includes structures to support data migration, including profile upgrades and model alignment.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of multiple frontend files, describing their purpose and role in the application architecture.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the main frontend script with Inter font setup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes React app with router, theme, auth, org context, and query client setup.
frontend/src/app/layout/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders topbar, sidebar, and bottom navigation for authenticated routes.
frontend/src/app/layout/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with links to key sections and a button to open the mobile menu.
frontend/src/app/layout/MobileNavMenu.ts: Mobile navigation drawer displaying internal and portal sections based on authentication and role permissions.
frontend/src/app/layout/Sidebar.tsx: Implements the sidebar navigation, showing internal or portal sections based on authentication and user roles.
frontend/src/app/layout/Topbar.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, current organization, and user menu including org switching, mock options, and logout.
Redirects authenticated users to the correct page based on role and organization state, or to login if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/app/router/ProtectedRoute.t: Wraps routes with authentication and optional organization checks, showing loading or access-denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/app/router/routes.tsx: Defines all application routes using TanStack Router, including auth, internal, and portal pages wrapped with AppShell and protection logic.
frontend/src/app/router/routeTree.tsx: Empty or placeholder file for route tree configuration.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Provides authentication context for mock or backend modes, handling user loading, login/logout, and profile adaptation.
frontend/src/auth/InternetIdentityAuthAd: Adapts Internet Identity data and backend profiles into the app’s unified AuthUser format, including role mapping.
frontend/src/auth/MockAuthProvider.tsx: Implements mock authentication with predefined users, plus a role selector UI for testing.
frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Defines application roles, their permissions, and helper functions to query access capabilities.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the brand logo image with a fallback text display on load error.
frontend/src/components/states/AccessDen: Displays an access‑denied alert with an optional message and a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/components/states/QueryBoun: Wrapper component that switches between loading, error, empty, or content states for data queries.
Provides reusable loading, error, and empty state UI components with icons and optional actions.
frontend/src/config/dataMode.ts: Controls whether the app runs in MOCK or BACKEND mode based on environment configuration.
frontend/src/data/api/backendClient.ts: Implements a backend client that maps frontend models to backend actor calls and handles data conversions.
frontend/src/data/client.ts: Exports a unified data client that routes all operations to either the mock or backend client depending on mode.
frontend/src/data/mock/mockClient.ts: In‑memory mock implementation of all data operations, using seeded data and mutable arrays.
frontend/src/data/mock/seed.ts: Provides mock seed data for organizations, users, permissions, projects, and related entities for mock mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useStage1Client.ts: Selects either a mock or backend data client based on mode and actor availability.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.ptBR.ts: Defines centralized Portuguese UI strings for actions, states, errors, and navigation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and custom theme variables for light/dark mode, typography, and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/org/OrgProvider.tsx: Manages the current organization selection, loading it from backend or storage and exposing helper context.
frontend/src/pages/auth/CreateOrganizati: UI page for creating an organization and selecting it, updating context and navigation afterward.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that redirects authenticated users and shows either mock role selection or an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SelectOrganizati: Page for listing and selecting an organization, with support for backend role syncing and navigation to creation if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SignupPage.tsx: Signup form with client-side validation and mock account creation before redirecting to login.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ActivitiesPa: Displays activities for the current organization and provides a dialog to create new activities with related entities.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ContactsPage: Manages contact list with search, filtering, creation, editing, and deletion using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ContractsPag: Shows recurring contracts, filtering by status, calculating MRR metrics, and providing a modal to create new contracts.
frontend/src/pages/internal/customer-suc: Dialog for submitting NPS responses, validating input, and handling disabled state when no active campaign exists.
frontend/src/pages/internal/CustomerSucc: Renders customer success dashboards with health, NPS, and churn tabs, fetching contracts, contacts, campaigns, and responses. Supports creating NPS campaigns and responses with dialogs and filtering by date range.
frontend/src/pages/internal/DashboardPag: Displays high-level business metrics including MRR, contacts, pipeline value, and recent activities. Fetches contacts, deals, contracts, and activities to compute summaries.
frontend/src/pages/internal/DealDetailPa: Shows detailed information for a selected deal, including contact data, status, stage, and metadata. Fetches deal and related contact and provides formatted presentation.
Manages financial transactions with filtering, sorting, and summary metrics like income, expenses, and balance. Includes dialog for creating transactions with recurring support.
frontend/src/pages/internal/PipelinePage: Provides a full deal pipeline view with stage filtering and CRUD dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting deals. Fetches deals and contacts while supporting navigation to deal details.
Lists predefined reports, allows selecting period and format, and provides export history with generation actions.
frontend/src/pages/internal/SettingsPage: Renders organization settings with tabs for general info, team, notifications, security, and integrations.
frontend/src/pages/portal/DeliverablesPa: Fetches and groups project deliverables by status and displays them in tabbed lists with loading and empty states.
Manages document listing and uploads, including category mapping, upload progress, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/portal/KpisPage.tsx: Displays project KPIs using react-query, showing trend icons, labels, and update timestamps with fallback when no active project is selected.
frontend/src/pages/portal/MeetingsPage.t: Lists upcoming and past project meetings and allows creating new meetings via a dialog with react-query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/portal/MessagesPage.t: Shows an organization’s support message thread and enables sending new messages, with role-based badges and react-query updates.
frontend/src/pages/portal/PortalSettings: Provides UI to toggle and save portal notification, display, and privacy settings in a tabbed interface.
frontend/src/pages/portal/ProjectDashboa: Loads and selects client projects, validates active project state, and displays project details and stage information.
frontend/src/pages/portal/StageTimelineP: Page that fetches and displays a project's stages and details, showing a timeline UI with loading and error boundaries.
frontend/src/pages/portal/TasksPage.tsx: Page for listing, creating, and updating project tasks with grouping by status and dialog-based task creation.
frontend/src/portal/useActiveProject.ts: Hook managing the active project ID with sessionStorage persistence and reset helpers.
frontend/src/types/model.ts: Central TypeScript model definitions for users, orgs, CRM entities, projects, tasks, and other domain types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining color tokens, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s backend goals, multi-tenant architecture, existing implemented features, and a list of pending feature requests with IDs and statuses. Captures overall build state including persistence, authentication, role-based access, and support messaging requirements.
